title: 03/17/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/17/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys open the show with the news surrounding the Bears. Not only did they strike out on Russell Wilson, but they followed it up by signing Andy Dalton, much to the dismay of Bears fans everywhere. ESPN Chicago’s Tom Waddle joined the show to express his frustration and how the Bears move forward post-Wilson speculation. As we creep closer to the beginning of the NCAA Tournament, Iona head coach Rick Pitino chats with Dan about his team and how crazy his life has been since his departure from Louisville a few years ago. Lastly, Michigan head coach Juwan Howard joins the show in the final hour to talk about his journey to leading his alma mater to a number one seed in the NCAA Tournament

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
